name: responsive-lazyload
description: A tool to lazyload images in a responsive, lightweight way (with fallbacks for unsupported browsers).

scripts.pages: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && git push && git checkout master
scripts.preversion: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && git add -A
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run pages
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scripts && npm run styles

author: Jason Lengstorf <jason@lengstorf.com> (@jlengstorf)
